Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
